head.title: Social Security, as Seen at 19 and 65

hedline.hl1: Social Security, as Seen at 19 and 65

abstract.p: Jack McGann letter warns that George W Bush's plan to allow workers to invest some of their Social Security money is going to get us all into trouble (S)

block.p: George W. Bush's plan to allow workers to choose how to invest some of their Social Security money is going to get us all into trouble (front page, May 16).

The recent growth in the stock market is tempting all of us. But you do not have to look very far to see some really big losers. Some of those who bought dot-com stocks have lost a large part of their investment. Mr.
George W. Bush's plan to allow workers to choose how to invest some of their Social Security money is going to get us all into trouble (front page, May 16).

The recent growth in the stock market is tempting all of us. But you do not have to look very far to see some really big losers. Some of those who bought dot-com stocks have lost a large part of their investment. Mr.
Bush may well be able to gamble his wealth on his new Social Security plan, but there are millions of Americans who will need every penny to make ends meet.
JACK MCGANN St. Augustine, Fla., May 17, 2000
